user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Amazon search results page for "Razer Nari" headsets. Two products are displayed: the Razer Nari Essential Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset for $49.99 (discounted from $99.99) and the Razer Nari Ultimate Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset for $69.00 (discounted from $74.97). Both items show additional delivery fees and estimated shipping times. The page also includes a category filter for PC accessories and shipping options to the Netherlands.
history_actions: click on the Amazon app icon located at the right lower part of the screen.
click on the located at the top.
click on the search suggestion for amazon.com located at the upper left.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the amazon search bar located at the upper part of the screen, and below the amazon icon.
click on the search result located at the upper left.
action_plan: Click on the 'Razer Nari Essential Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset' product to open its product page.
Click on the 'Add to Cart' button on the product page.
